title: bhayappaDAdiru
sahitya:
bhayappaDAdiru manamE nalla bhaktaraik-kAkkum parAshakti tuNai UNDenrum


anupallavi

  ayalavar vAzhndAl vembuya sIriDum Attirap-porAmaiyin nAttikak-koDumaiyAl


caraNam    naya vanjakam pinnE naghaittup-puram pEshinum namam pAshamE edirttu nalivura vIsinum
svaya nala ahankAram tuyar pala sheidAlum duSTap-paghaivar unmEl shuDucaram peidAlum padarAdE 
cittam sidarAdE anbai udarAdE vimmik-kadarAdE dayai vaDivAna dEvi abhayam tandunaik-kAppAL
